SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.TransactionService
public class TransactionService extends Object
Service class for managing financial transactions in the application. This class provides functionality for: - Adding new transactions - Loading existing transactions - Importing transactions from multiple file formats (CSV, CSV UTF-8, Excel) - Saving transactions with encryption - Validating transaction data All transaction data is encrypted before storage and decrypted when retrieved to ensure data security.
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionService

      public TransactionService()

  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      public boolean addTransaction(User user, Transaction newTx)
      Adds a new transaction for a user. Checks for duplicates before adding the transaction.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who owns the transaction
      newTx - The new transaction to add
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was added successfully, false if it was a duplicate

    • loadTransactions

      public List<Transaction> loadTransactions(User user)
      Loads all transactions for a specific user from the encrypted storage. The transactions are stored in a JSON file named after the user's UID.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose transactions to load
      Returns:
      A list of transactions for the user, or an empty list if none exist

    • importTransactions

      public void importTransactions(User user, File file)
      Imports transactions from a file for a user. Supports CSV files (both UTF-8 and default encoding) and Excel (xlsx) files. Validates the file format and handles duplicate transactions. Shows appropriate alerts for success or failure.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to import transactions for
      file - The file containing the transactions (CSV or Excel)

    • saveTransactions

      public void saveTransactions(User user, List<Transaction> transactions)
      Saves a list of transactions for a user to encrypted storage. The transactions are encrypted before being saved to ensure data security.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who owns the transactions
      transactions - The list of transactions to save
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error writing to the file
      EncryptionService.EncryptionException - If there is an error encrypting the data

    • importTransactionsFromCSV

      @Deprecated public void importTransactionsFromCSV(User user, File csvFile)
      Deprecated.
      Use importTransactions(User, File) instead
      Deprecated method to maintain backwards compatibility. Please use importTransactions() instead.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to import transactions for
      csvFile - The CSV file containing the transactions
